Uses of Class
positionable.Positionable

  • Packages that use Positionable 
    Package Description
    attackable  
    board  
    positionable  

    • Uses of Positionable in attackable

      Subclasses of Positionable in attackable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Attackable
      Abstract class that includes all the Positionables that can be attacked and for this reason they have a life and a defense.
      class  Fighter
      Public class of Robots that can attack and use Weapons
      class  Obstacle
      Class that includes the objects Obstacle that are characterized by all the instance variables of the Attackables and by a weight that can be removed from the Robot that try to move the Obstacle
      class  Robot<T extends Useable>
      Abstract class that describes a generic robot .
      class  Worker
      Public Robot class that can repair and handle Item.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameBoard.addPositionableRandomly(Positionable pos)
      Adds an element positionable on the playing field to a position Randomly generated.
      void GameBoard.insertPositionable(Positionable pos)
      Inserts the positionable in this position in his state.
      void GameBoard.removePositionable(Positionable pos)
      Removes a Positionable.
